cluster.name: ST%s
cluster.description: DMA Stream X: SxCR, SxNDTR, SxPAR, SxM0AR, SxM1AR, SxFCR

field.name: CHSEL
field.description: Channel selection

field.name: MBURST
field.description: Memory burst transfer configuration

field.name: PBURST
field.description: Peripheral burst transfer configuration

field.name: CT
field.description: Current target (only in double buffer mode)

field.name: DBM
field.description: Double buffer mode

field.name: PL
field.description: Priority level

field.name: PINCOS
field.description: Peripheral increment offset size

field.name: MSIZE
field.description: Memory data size

field.name: PSIZE
field.description: Peripheral data size

field.name: MINC
field.description: Memory increment mode

field.name: PINC
field.description: Peripheral increment mode

field.name: CIRC
field.description: Circular mode

field.name: DIR
field.description: Data transfer direction

field.name: PFCTRL
field.description: Peripheral flow controller

field.name: TCIE
field.description: Transfer complete interrupt enable

field.name: HTIE
field.description: Half transfer interrupt enable

field.name: TEIE
field.description: Transfer error interrupt enable

field.name: DMEIE
field.description: Direct mode error interrupt enable

field.name: EN
field.description: Stream enable / flag stream ready when read low

register.name: SNDTR
register.description: DMA Stream X number of data register

field.name: NDT
field.description: Number of data items to transfer

register.name: SPAR
register.description: DMA Stream X peripheral address register

field.name: PA
field.description: Peripheral address

register.name: SM0AR
register.description: DMA Stream X memory 0 address register

field.name: M0A
field.description: Memory 0 address

register.name: SM1AR
register.description: DMA Stream X memory 1 address register

field.name: M1A
field.description: Memory 1 address (used in case of Double buffer mode)

register.name: SFCR
register.description: DMA Stream X FIFO control register

field.name: FEIE
field.description: FIFO error interrupt enable

field.name: FS
field.description: FIFO status

field.name: DMDIS
field.description: Direct mode disable

field.name: FTH
field.description: FIFO threshold selection
